data.title: Apartments for Rent
data.meta_description: Whether you're looking for an apartment to rent, a property manager, or a career, BH is a place where you can thrive. Discover what it means to live BH.
data.text:
Your next chapter starts here.

At BH, we’re setting the standard in multifamily, creating a smarter way to live, invest, manage, and grow. We’re not OK with OK. We’re here to make magic happen.

living more – happily. vibrantly. responsibly.

OUR RESIDENTS

Spaces to live & thrive

Renting has never been better. Find your home and see why living here means living more.

OUR EXPERTISE

Meet our in-house powerhouse

It’s quite the stack. Vertically integrated means we can do it smarter, faster, and with way better data.

OUR STATS

Big footprint, big foot.

We’re NMHC Top 10. We didn’t get there by chance. It’s been hard work, but we’re here for it.

Multifamily units

Apartment communities

Student communities

Build-to-Rent communities

WHY BH MANAGEMENT™

We like to own the outcome. From business intelligence to our in-house advertising platform, we build it ourselves because we know we can do it better.

OUR PEOPLE

Our collective brainpower is our superpower.

We think our work matters and believe magic happens when people are encouraged to ask, “What if…?” Change-makers, creative thinkers, high-five-givers are welcome here.

ARTICLES

Everyone enjoys a good read.

Contact Us

Ready to turn impossible into already done?
